TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RuleSettings extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class RuleSettings Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 設定 ASP.NET 事件規則。

span.span: Configures the ASP.NET event rules.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件規則會決定哪一個提供者引發的事件，使用一個設定檔。Event rules determine which event, using which profile, is fired to which provider. ## Examples 下列組態檔摘錄示範如何以宣告方式指定的屬性類別。The following configuration file excerpt shows how to declaratively specify the properties of the class. ``` ``` 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和設定的值型別。The following code example shows how to create and set the values of the type. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 取得或設定自訂類別的完整型別，其會實作 。

span.span: Gets or sets the fully qualified type of a custom class that implements .

value.span: 自訂類別的完整型別，會實作 。

span.span: The fully qualified type of a custom class that implements .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 型別參考不正確，如下所示 （括號中的項目不是必要）：*命名空間*。*Typename*， *Assemblyname*[、] [版本 = x] [文化特性 = y] [PublicKeyToken = z]。The type reference is formed as follows (items in brackets are not required): *Namespace*.*Typename*, *Assemblyname*[,] [Version=x,] [Culture=y,] [PublicKeyToken=z]. 比方說，"ExampleNameSpace.ExampleType，Example.Assembly，版本 = %assembly_version%，Culture = neutral，PublicKeyToken = %microsoft_publickey%"For example, "ExampleNameSpace.ExampleType, Example.Assembly, Version=%ASSEMBLY_VERSION%, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=%MICROSOFT_PUBLICKEY%" ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#92](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/CS/healthmonitoringsection.cs#92)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#92](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/VB/healthmonitoringsection.vb#92)]

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the object this rule applies to.

value.span: 適用這項規則的 物件名稱。

span.span: The name of the object this rule applies to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所參考的物件必須包含相同也包含此物件 The object referenced by this property must be contained by the same object that also contains this 物件。object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#86](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/CS/healthmonitoringsection.cs#86)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#86](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/VB/healthmonitoringsection.vb#86)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定引發相同型別事件的最多次數。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of times events of the same type are raised.

value.span: 相同型別事件引發的最多次數。

span.span: The maximum number of times events of the same type are raised.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性必須具有大於零的值。This property must have a value greater than zero. 無效的值可能會導致儲存的組態區段時擲回例外狀況。Invalid values may cause an exception to be thrown when the configuration section is saved. 這表示將會引發事件相同類型的最大次數。This represents the maximum number of times an event of the same type will be raised. 例如，如果值為`10`，則會引發 10 次，之後忽略事件。For example, if the value is `10`, then the event will be raised 10 times and ignored thereafter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#89](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/CS/healthmonitoringsection.cs#89)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#89](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/VB/healthmonitoringsection.vb#89)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MinInstances { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定在向提供者引發事件之前，相同事件型別發生的最少次數。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum number of occurrences of the same type of event before the event is raised to the provider.

value.span: 向提供者引發事件之前，相同事件型別發生的最少次數。

span.span: The minimum number of occurrences of the same type of event before the event is raised to the provider.
The default value is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性必須具有大於零的值。This property must have a value greater than zero. 無效的值可能會導致儲存的組態區段時擲回例外狀況。Invalid values may cause an exception to be thrown when the configuration section is saved. 這代表事件發生之前就會引發事件給提供者最少次數。This represents the minimum number of times an event occurs before an event is raised to the provider. 例如，如果傳回值是`5`，則 ASP.NET 將不會引發事件給提供者，直到發生事件的第五個執行個體。For example, if the return value is `5`, then ASP.NET will not raise an event to the provider until the fifth instance of the event occurs. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#90](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/CS/healthmonitoringsection.cs#90)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#90](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/VB/healthmonitoringsection.vb#90)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan MinInterval { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定兩個相同型別事件之間的最短時間間隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum time interval between two events of the same type.

value.span: 兩個相同型別事件之間的最短間隔。

span.span: The minimum time interval between two events of the same type.
The default value is 0 ticks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值可無限期設定為。The value can be made infinite by setting it to . 無效的值可能會導致儲存的組態區段時擲回例外狀況。Invalid values may cause an exception to be thrown when the configuration section is saved. 如果值為零，就沒有最小的間隔。If the value is zero, then there is no minimum interval. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
